inputs.description: The text to initialize generation with

TextGenerationParameters.title: TextGenerationParameters
TextGenerationParameters.description: Additional inference parameters for Text Generation

best_of.description: The number of sampling queries to run. Only the best one (in terms of total logprob) will be returned.

decoder_input_details.description: Whether or not to output decoder input details

details.description: Whether or not to output details

do_sample.description: Whether to use logits sampling instead of greedy decoding when generating new tokens.

max_new_tokens.description: The maximum number of tokens to generate.

repetition_penalty.description: The parameter for repetition penalty. A value of 1.0 means no penalty. See [this paper](https://hf.co/papers/1909.05858) for more details.

return_full_text.description: Whether to prepend the prompt to the generated text.

stop_sequences.description: Stop generating tokens if a member of `stop_sequences` is generated.

temperature.description: The value used to modulate the logits distribution.

top_k.description: The number of highest probability vocabulary tokens to keep for top-k-filtering.

top_p.description: If set to < 1, only the smallest set of most probable tokens with probabilities that add up to `top_p` or higher are kept for generation.

truncate.description: Truncate input tokens to the given size.

typical_p.description: Typical Decoding mass. See [Typical Decoding for Natural Language Generation](https://hf.co/papers/2202.00666) for more information

watermark.description: Watermarking with [A Watermark for Large Language Models](https://hf.co/papers/2301.10226)

GrammarType.title: GrammarType
GrammarType.description: The type of grammar to use for generation
